prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
RESUME
PREETI BENUR                                                                                      Mail id: preetikb83102@gmail.com    
                                                                                                                     Mobile:+91 8310274342.       
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Over 7 years of IT experience and extensively worked in software testing (Quality Control).
Good Experience in Functional Automation testing Tools, HP - QTP/UFT One and Selenium Webdriver.
Experience in Understanding and implementing Automation Frameworks like Data Driven, Hybrid Frameworks, BDD Cucumber and TestNG Framework.
Expertise in VB Script, Descriptive programming and creating user defined functions in UFT.
Experience in using Function Libraries, Actions, and Environmental Variables, Data Tables, Recovery Scenarios, Web tables and regular expression for automation testing.
Good at understanding in Object Repository & Object identification.
Expertise in creating reusable functions for the reusable functionality is using VB Script in UFT.
Experience in designing the automation test scripts using various locators like XPath and CSS Selectors in Selenium.
Expertise in developing reusable methods using Java in Selenium.
Well versed with Core Java and oops concepts.
Maintaining and Executing the Selenium Scripts through TestNG Framework.
Experience in working on Agile/Scrum methodology.
Expert in writing Test Cases, executing Test procedures, analyzing Test Results, and Track Defects.
Specific testing expertise includes Smoke Testing, Functional Testing, Usability Testing, System Testing and Regression Testing.
Good experience in understanding the customer requirements.
Worked closely with development team to assure the quality of software within specified time frame.
Experience in HP - ALM for Test Management.
Client interaction for Business Requirement Specifications (BRS) and understanding of technical and functional specifications (FRS).
Successful record
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
